answers.answer: I don't think so, I would be going to the doc to see what's up. You don't want to have preeclampsia or anything like that, it puts you and baby at risk!
I would actually say to see emerg even...that should be looked after asap!

You need to be seen and have your blood pressure etc checked. Swelling like that is not completely normal. A little can be if you're on your feet a lot but what you describe needs to be seen by a doctor.

I had swollen feet a lot last time. odema I think its called its no harm just raise feet and get the support tights to wear during the day....but id still get it checked to be safe...they'll check urine and blood pressure.

question: Im 22 weeks today and my feet are throbbing, hot and swollen, is this ok?
title: swelling
